main event: A sighting of a round, white object occurred on 3 July 1955 in Hollywood, California.
interesting points: The object was observed traveling in a straight line for thirty seconds before disappearing., The object was described as being the size of a quarter dollar., The reporting group was local, and the observation type was ground-visual., The sighting has been categorized as 'Unknown' after investigation., The source of the report was a 39-year-old songwriter and ground observer.
witness description: a 39-year-old songwriter and ground observer, member of Ground Observers Corps
